plot: Because of a plane crash a group of students are spending their lives on a desert island where there's nothing available and they'll have to make it themselves. The students will show to eat cicadas, how to build traps, a simple allergy test, how to eat hermit crabs, and more. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Koko wa Doko" (Where Are We?) by M.A.O, Hiyori Kono, Kiyono Yasuno, & Azumi Waki
